coreAtributes.name: Armored Gloves
coreAtributes.description: A pair of hevay fabric gloves reinforced with metal to protect the upperhands.

displacementText.playerSelf: You take off your armored gloves.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s armored gloves and roughly pull them off [npc.her] hands.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your armored gloves and roughly pulls them off your hands.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s armored gloves and roughly pulls them off [npc2.her] hands.

replacementText.playerSelf: You put on the armored gloves.
replacementText.playerNPC: You put [npc.name]'s armored gloves on [npc.her] hands.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the armored gloves on [npc.her] hands.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] puts your armored gloves on your hands.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly puts the armored gloves on your hands.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] puts [npc2.name]'s armored gloves on their hands.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s armored gloves and roughly puts them on [npc2.her] hands.

displacementText.playerSelf: You take off your armored gloves.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s armored gloves and roughly pull them off [npc.her] hands.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your armored gloves and roughly pulls them off your hands.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s armored gloves and roughly pulls them off [npc2.her] hands.

replacementText.playerSelf: You put on the armored gloves.
replacementText.playerNPC: You put [npc.name]'s armored gloves on [npc.her] hands.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the armored gloves on [npc.her] hands.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] puts your armored gloves on your hands.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly puts the armored gloves on your hands.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] puts [npc2.name]'s armored gloves on their hands.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s armored gloves and roughly puts them on [npc2.her] hands.
